name: Mint a Subdomain on Doma!
description:
## Quest Description

### Mint a Subdomain on Doma

This quest is about minting **one subdomain** on Doma.

A subdomain is made by **staking domain tokens**.

You can do this **very cheaply** with many options under $0.01.

You can mint:

* a random or fun subdomain by staking as little as **1 domain token**
* or a cleaner, nicer subdomain by staking more tokens

Both are valid.

You only need **one subdomain**.

**Quest period:**
Wednesday, February 4th, 2026 at 2:00 PM UTC
to
Tuesday, February 10th, 2026 at 2:00 PM UTC

**Reward:** 50 Leaderboard Points
**Total winners:** 5,000

Credentials update **once per day around 2:00 PM UTC**.
The **final update** will happen **1 hour before the quest ends**.

description:

This quiz is designed to both challenge and educate. With questions ranging from basic to advanced, it's a fun way to engage with the project details and perhaps learn something new.

Campaign Period : 
5th February - 13th February, 2026
Prize Pool : 
166,666 $CLAT 
Winner : 
100

name: Final Push Before the Olympex Pass Launch
description:
Q1 is getting closer, and so is the launch of the Olympics Pass NFTs.

These Social Tasks are designed to reward the community that has been supporting Olympex early and helping keep the ecosystem active across our networks.

Once the Olympics Pass NFTs go live, holders will be able to start tracking on-chain and off-chain activity, unlocking eligibility for future rewards, including the Nectar airdrop, based on real participation.

By completing these tasks, you‚Äôre not just supporting the community.
You‚Äôre positioning yourself early, making sure your activity is visible before the next phase begins.

It only takes a minute.
Your support now will matter later.

name: Markets fall, but rewards rise
description:
The launch of the Olympex Pass NFT is happening in February, and it is an essential piece of the Olympex ecosystem to access rewards.

This NFT:

Is required to participate in the rewards system

Can be freely bought and sold

Transfers all its qualities and benefits across wallets

Acts as a key to unlock opportunities within the ecosystem

Owning the Olympex Pass is essential to participate in Olympex and access upcoming rewards.

name: CHECKPOINT BLITZ
description:
## QUICK QUESTS. FAST REWARDS. FASTER WINS.


#### gotta' go fast, gotta' BLITZ   ‚îÄ=‚â°Œ£((( „Å§ÔºûÔºú)„Å§

BLITZ is built for speed. Jump into quick quests, earn rewards fast, and keep moving faster. No long grinds, just focused action and fast payoffs.

‚Ä¶but wait, what is Checkpoint? Checkpoint is your home for points. We are building the architecture that makes points usable, ONCHAIN. Today, people use it to check and track their points, projects use it to display points or build apps and soon you will be able to do much more with it.

Learn more about Checkpoint with our  [docs](https://docs.checkpoint.exchange) OR check our [web app](https://checkpoint.exchange/?ref=galxe). 

---

#### About CHECKPOINT BLITZ

BLITZ is an ongoing campaign, with quests regularly opening and closing within 6-48 hour windows. New opportunities appear often, so check back frequently to catch the latest quests and an opportunity to earn sweet rewards.

Rewards match the speed of the campaign and are typically smaller than those in our mainline campaigns. Each quest stands on its own and may have different entry requirements.

Happy BLITZING  (‚ùõ‚ó°ÀÇÃµ ÃëÃë‚úß)!

name: Proof of Love: Ocash Valentine's Day Campaign - Ocash Tutorial Creation
description:
Create and share an Ocash tutorial or personal experience on Twitter to earn Galxe points and enter a raffle to share the 20,000 ZKJ prize pool.
Submit your post link and reward address after publishing. Original and informative content is encouraged.

**Submit your Tutorial and EVM address here:**
https://forms.gle/tftxC1LzXEpQuqPJ6

Note: The submission deadline is 30 minutes prior to the end of the campaign. Credential will be updated daily.

name: CHECKPOINT SPRINT
description:
## 100K G$ total reward. Ends in 2 weeks.
----
Welcome, welcome, (*¬¥‚àáÔΩÄ)„Éé

Good you made it, we are Checkpoint. What you can do with Checkpoint? Well you can check points for EVM addy's. You can also track your points. You can build Apps with it. Soon you also can trade points with it.

There is a lot you can do with it, but it's exceptionally valuable if you farm points. It keeps track of all your points in one awesome platform.

This is a serie of 5 quests, that all end on the 9th of February. When a new series of quest will come live. These quests are in sequence, finish the first to go to the second and so forth.

We are looking for power users that giv feedback and don't want bots participating in the campaign. This means that with each subsequent quests, the participation requirements can increase, but at the same time, you get more of a chance for sweet $G.

GLHF \^o^/!

name: CHECKPOINT MOMENTUM
description:
### New year. New momentum. Bigger rewards.
#### Kick off the Lunar New Year with Checkpoint Momentum, where progress doesn‚Äôt reset, it compounds (‡πëÀÉÃµ·¥óÀÇÃµ)Ÿà ÔæñÔΩº!


Build momentum throughout the campaign and unlock some of the biggest rewards we‚Äôve offered, designed to keep you moving into the new year and help with your points checking and tracking journey!

Checkpoint Exchange is galloping towards testnet, but you may wonder, what is Checkpoint?

Glad you asked. **Checkpoint** is a project where you can easily check and track your points. Paste any EVM addy or name and it resolves to points. Simple.

You can do lots of other things with Checkpoint as well; build apps, integrate projects and much more. BUT the most exciting part is trading points soon, from offchain to onchain, pretty neat huh?! („ÄÉÔø£Ô∏∂Ôø£)‰∫∫(Ôø£Ô∏∂Ôø£„ÄÉ)

Learn more about Checkpoint with our  [docs](https://docs.checkpoint.exchange) OR check our [web app](https://checkpoint.exchange/?ref=galxe). 

---

#### About CHECKPOINT MOMENTUM

This series of quests is not sequential, jump in anytime and take your shot at earning some sweet rewards. Better yet, rewards are guaranteed and claims are gas free. Momentum quests will end on February 28th or earlier, with claims open after.

With varying levels of difficulty, tasks, and entry requirements, there‚Äôs something for everyone to build momentum along the way.

Have fun, GLHF, and Happy Lunar New Year  |^o^/!

name: Mahjong Stars: A Quest for $TILE
description:
**Mahjong Stars is launching soon.**

Complete the quest to get early access and earn $TILE before the public release.
Connect your wallet, follow the steps, and be ready for launch. Early players get the best rewards.

**$TILE** is our onchain token - it gives discounts on Star Points, unlocks premium matches and events, lets you buy NFTs, and earns staking rewards.
Star Points are the in-game (off chain) currency you use to play matches, place bets, earn rewards, and cash out through NFTs.

At the end, top players secure IRL Gold Tile collectibles - real physical Mahjong tiles made with real gold accents from our limited 144-piece set.
